Note that field names are case-insensitive. All names are localized unless otherwise mentioned. If the field has no meaningful value, the result will be empty unless otherwise mentioned.

|| Field || Aliases || Meaning ||
|| album || || Album name ||
|| albumartist || album artist || Album artist string (producers + vocalists or "various") ||
|| artist || track artist || Track artist string ||
|| catalognum || || Catalog number ||
|| discnumber || || Disc number ||
|| featvocalists || || Comma-separated list of vocalists prefixed by "feat." if there is at least one vocalist, otherwise empty ||
|| producers || || Comma-separated list of producers ||
